title: presovapeter
author: presovapeter
content: Today I have been scammed by 1xbit1 website. They are totaly lairs and close my account without any reasons and didnt back my money I invested and deposited there, and also not give me winning money.This is shame on internet and hope some of any moderators or security of 1xbit will see this post and tell me WHY I am not able to login on my account and WHY you not give me back my deposited money as your rules written on website!?Here is proof to see every people in world that I have been scammed today.I deposited  2 times photo:  https://ibb.co/6JK43gJI bet many bets and some lost some win. and I bet on ticket see picture: https://ibb.co/XykM9hX Then they have been logged me out from my account and I sent email to security why cant login?! And they told me this: https://ibb.co/RpQrKh7I sent again email to tell me why cant login and why not back to me even my deposit and they continue with this: https://ibb.co/nD3hgBb and again and again same, it is automatic scam bot who replay on that emails.My ticket won after I check on bets checking number: https://ibb.co/hFyHfM8  but ofcorse i cant login and get my winnings and also my deposits of 152 usd in cryptoThis is my account number 542744833 with balance before they logged me out and blocked login: https://ibb.co/PG7YjRpI am writing this because I am pissed out and how can website who promote on internet , ads you tube , forums and everywhere to scam like this? I will continue to blam this until they give me my money back!

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: presovapeter on January 18, 2023, 04:35:06 PMToday I have been scammed by 1xbit1 website. They are totaly lairs and close my account without any reasons and didnt back my money I invested and deposited there, and also not give me winning money.This is shame on internet and hope some of any moderators or security of 1xbit will see this post and tell me WHY I am not able to login on my account and WHY you not give me back my deposited money as your rules written on website!?Here is proof to see every people in world that I have been scammed today.I deposited  2 times photo: I bet many bets and some lost some win. and I bet on ticket see picture: Then they have been logged me out from my account and I sent email to security why cant login?! And they told me this: I sent again email to tell me why cant login and why not back to me even my deposit and they continue with this:  and again and again same, it is automatic scam bot who replay on that emails.My ticket won after I check on bets checking number:   but ofcorse i cant login and get my winnings and also my deposits of 152 usd in cryptoThis is my account number 542744833 with balance before they logged me out and blocked login: I am writing this because I am pissed out and how can website who promote on internet , ads you tube , forums and everywhere to scam like this? I will continue to blam this until they give me my money back!I have edited the link to your photo so that it can be used on the image tag. I have done that and quoted so that the image can be shown directly without opening the link of the image. One more thing I am very curious to know is how you get the information on this forum after being scammed and why you can't get this forum before being scammed.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Quote from: presovapeter on January 18, 2023, 04:35:06 PMThis is shame on internet and hope some of any moderators or security of 1xbit will see this post and tell me WHY I am not able to login on my account and WHY you not give me back my deposited money as your rules written on website!?Don't expect something like this for this casino, there are more than hundreds of same scam accusations against this casino. They don't care about it. They never come here to explain. So what I say always about the 1xbit victims that forgot it and learn from this lesson. Always try to do your own investigation before depositing on any platform. Best of luck

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I don't really have anything to say to Op I don't know if he/she is just so lazy that they can't do a five minutes research on a site they want to put their money in... We have several threads accusing 1xbit of scam and you still went ahead using the 1xbit. And now your here to add another scam thread to the threads that has been created before in the past. Let's just wait and see if those representing the site in this forum will have anything to say concerning the issue laid down. P.s Op you can see that all 1xbit campaigners has been neg tag for promoting the site.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: This is a regular activity of 1xbit as they are in the market to scam their customers. Unfortunately for you, it's important to do a little due diligence before depositing on a website with such a bad reputation. If you look at the account of this forum representative of 1xbit, you will understand how bad their reputation is. A lot of complaints are coming against them everyday, even gamblers like you deposit on this website and get scammed.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: This is another case of should have been. if OP just takes time and checked the internet for accusations he can save his money from going down the drain, its another charity for 1XBIT, and the accusation is mounting and the group of people that 1xbit scammed is growing, it will not end anytime soon unless the authorities put a stop on their operation, if they are just hosted on a responsible hosting site or domain registrar like Namecheap, the platform will be disabled a long time.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Quote from: presovapeter on January 18, 2023, 04:35:06 PMI am writing this because I am pissed out and how can website who promote on internet , ads you tube , forums and everywhere to scam like this? I will continue to blam this until they give me my money back!Must be sorry to say, you will not get your money back like in other cases related to casino scam sites.Ads on Google or social media will still show sites that paid them for ads. the blame lies with yourself for not protecting your money properly.the casino's reputation is very bad, if you search on google I think you will get a link to alleged fraud from the casino. why don't you first check the casino that you just found on the internet? I hope you get quite valuable experience this time. once again, do not expect your money back.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: presovapeter on January 18, 2023, 04:35:06 PMI am writing this because I am pissed out and how can website who promote on internet , ads you tube , forums and everywhere to scam like this? I will continue to blam this until they give me my money back!I would like to remind you that advertising on Youtube, forum, or even Facebook is not the parameters of a reputable casino, these platforms will just accept payment without doing research if the project is legit or not, as long as they qualify on the requirements that they laid out, in the case of 1xbit, they have a huge budget in their advertising because they are a notorious scammer, its no use blaming yourself just warn your friends or people you know that gamble to avoid 1xbit if many people like you warn people there will be few people that will join 1xbit.

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: I am sorry for your loss. I didn't even read the full thread and here I am to comment about it. 1xbit/1xbet is full of shit and they are proven scammers. I am sorry that the community cannot help you to recover your lost funds. Next time do some research before you deposit at any casinos. Do not rely on Trustpilot only. Trustpilot is manipulated as well. Do some research on the forum and outside of the forum as well.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP account is a new one but I am still curious as to how OP got to know about this platform. It is either OP is an old member here patronizing 1xbit/1xbet  and he has been with them for a long time and upon his account being blocked, he has has to disguise himself to lay  complaint and does not want anybody to know his real account here. If you have long been existing here you should have seen the flags and tag attached to promoters of the 1xbit/1xbet promoters.They are scam and I am sorry to say this, I do not think you would get your funds back and also sorry that their is no possibility that you would get any assistance from here because it is a well known information here about the activities of the scam casino called 1xbet.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Quote from: John Abraham on January 20, 2023, 01:50:12 PMI am sorry for your loss. I didn't even read the full thread and here I am to comment about it. 1xbit/1xbet is full of shit and they are proven scammers. I am sorry that the community cannot help you to recover your lost funds. Next time do some research before you deposit at any casinos. Do not rely on Trustpilot only. Trustpilot is manipulated as well. Do some research on the forum and outside of the forum as well.You are right in that, but many people are still not on this forum and what is the first thing you will normally do when you want to try out a new website? You will google it and try to read some reviews, like on trustpilot. On trustpilot they score 4.1, which is very high so you would be inclined to believe it is a legit casino. Everybody who is long enough on this forum knows that 1xbit is a scam but new people will keep falling for it, I am afraid.https://www.trustpilot.com/review/1xbit.com

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on January 20, 2023, 06:38:50 PMOP account is a new one but I am still curious as to how OP got to know about this platform. He said it himself:Quote from: presovapeter on January 18, 2023, 04:35:06 PMI am writing this because I am pissed out and how can website who promote on internet , ads you tube , forums and everywhere to scam like this? I've turned once ublock to see what a favorite site of mine that I use to check prices looks like as it showed 12 blocked ads, and surprise surprise, who had the banner right on top? 1xbit! They trick a lot of users with that 7 BTC bonus or the one with 100% bonus on your deposits.They even get some paid articles in different crypto news outlets, like this one, so if somebody is not doing his own research deep enough and only gets though the paid reviews, and there are dozen of them pretty high up in google search results, and well, this happens.I lost hope with this one, seems like it will not end until they've scammed every single person in this world, maybe some of them even twice!Quote from: shasan on January 18, 2023, 04:49:03 PMOne more thing I am very curious to know is how you get the information on this forum after being scammed and why you can't get this forum before being scammed.Maybe because if you search just the name of the casino you end up with a ton of fake positive reviews in google (at least on this IP I'm using now), but once you're getting tricked and you ask yourself "is 1xbit a scam" bitcointalk is the third result.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on January 20, 2023, 07:02:22 PMQuote from: shasan on January 18, 2023, 04:49:03 PMOne more thing I am very curious to know is how you get the information on this forum after being scammed and why you can't get this forum before being scammed.Maybe because if you search just the name of the casino you end up with a ton of fake positive reviews in google (at least on this IP I'm using now), but once you're getting tricked and you ask yourself "is 1xbit a scam" bitcointalk is the third result.  The search engine will give you results based on your parameters, the searcher should give specific keywords to come out with research with tags on it, on 1xbit search for the keyword 1xbit reviews it still comes out with the results with Bitcointalk reviews on it, if only the potential player will just use these keywords, he will find out the trust about 1xbit, but these newbies who got scammed obviously did not do searches they just sign up and play, maybe they stumble it from banners or from promotions not from the search engine.

comments.author: altcointalk14
comments.body: Has anyone checked the statistics of visits to the 1XBIT website and what the proportions are?Because I get the feeling you all don't know what you're talking about.Let me give you a hint - 1XBIT has tens of thousands of visitors a day. (Don't believe me - check it out by yourself)If such a huge casino - directly related to 1XBET, i.e. such powers as FC BARCELONA and SERIE A wanted to cheat someone, it would be enough that it would take one bet per million dollars and not play with small users for $500.Activate your brains and don't look at the suggestions

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Quote from: babygun on January 20, 2023, 06:58:52 PMYou are right in that, but many people are still not on this forum and what is the first thing you will normally do when you want to try out a new website? You will google it and try to read some reviews, like on trustpilot. On trustpilot they score 4.1, which is very high so you would be inclined to believe it is a legit casino. Everybody who is long enough on this forum knows that 1xbit is a scam but new people will keep falling for it, I am afraid.https://www.trustpilot.com/review/1xbit.comI believe this was discussed before. Trustpilot has not trusted itself. How would people trust Trustpilot? They have been accused of removing bad reviews, and they get paid by 1xbit/1xbet. Trustpilot deletes bad reviews when those accused platforms give them money to do that. The same thing happened with 1xbet reviews. That's why they got a pretty high rating on Trustpilot.

comments.author: presovapeter
comments.body: Quote from: altcointalk14 on January 21, 2023, 03:16:45 AMHas anyone checked the statistics of visits to the 1XBIT website and what the proportions are?Because I get the feeling you all don't know what you're talking about.Let me give you a hint - 1XBIT has tens of thousands of visitors a day. (Don't believe me - check it out by yourself)If such a huge casino - directly related to 1XBET, i.e. such powers as FC BARCELONA and SERIE A wanted to cheat someone, it would be enough that it would take one bet per million dollars and not play with small users for $500.Activate your brains and don't look at the suggestionsYou poor scammer and joke who ads scamming website bet 1xbit and you will be scammer by them too.They are scamming 1 milion of players who bet on 100,200,300 dollars and do you know how much money are they in total?btw for the powers as barcelona and seria A better you search and you will find your scamming words here:https://josimarfootball.com/bankrupt-and-expanding/https://www.curacaochronicle.com/post/main/supreme-court-upholds-bankruptcy-judgment-largest-online-sports-betting-company-in-curacao/I am still not paid and my account is blocked without give me back my deposits. Do you know how I feel that they are scamming me without give me back my deposit I invest there:? My own money?

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Quote from: altcointalk14 on January 21, 2023, 03:16:45 AMHas anyone checked the statistics of visits to the 1XBIT website and what the proportions are?Because I get the feeling you all don't know what you're talking about.So what are you talking about? You meant the 1xbit is still legit? All the accusations and false and they are all lying? And the DT's who have tagged all 1xbit accounts, they are also laying?They could have a lot of traffics because they are promoting themselves in a lot of big places with the fund that they earned by scamming their users. Or maybe you did not face any issues there yet /(you are paid for shilling them) that not means all the accusations are false, they are just blaming to get their fund back.

comments.author: stompix
comments.created_time: January 25, 2023, 03:26:38 PMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 07:16:08 PM by stompix
comments.body: Quote from: altcointalk14 on January 21, 2023, 03:16:45 AMIf such a huge casino - directly related to 1XBET, i.e. such powers as FC BARCELONA and SERIE A wanted to cheat someone, it would be enough that it would take one bet per million dollars and not play with small users for $500.Yeah right, and what does sponsorship have to do with it actively scamming users?Remember this?Scam a few thousand small users out of a few hundred with 1xbit and you have enough to cover all the publicity costs and run the 1xbet in some kind of "legit way", of course "legit"by 1xbit terms means just a little less scammy.Which didn't help them as much as they are losing licenses right and left in the EU right now.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: altcointalk14 on January 21, 2023, 03:16:45 AMHas anyone checked the statistics of visits to the 1XBIT website and what the proportions are?Because I get the feeling you all don't know what you're talking about.Let me give you a hint - 1XBIT has tens of thousands of visitors a day. (Don't believe me - check it out by yourself)They are getting thousands of visitors because they are spending a lot of money in marketing. Since they are getting new customers and scamming them, they are able to cover these huge marketing costs. They are giving paid advertisements every day on various platforms including YouTube channels. They spend that much money to get visitors. As such, it is not surprising that they are getting daily visitors, so it does not increase the reputation of this website.
